title: QuizRush
description: Speed thinking or face the chase!
atmosphereText: Speed thinking or face the chase.
atmosphereText1: You don't know who is behind you
atmosphereText2: Screams of fear were heard everywhere
atmosphereText3: You have to be right or you'll be caught
joinDescription: Enter the room code below to play.
hostDescription: Create a new room to play
settingsDescription: Choose your chaser and set up your game!
warningText: WARNING: This game contains horror elements that may not be suitable for all players

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.description: Slow but relentless. Will keep chasing without stopping.

monster1.name: Mad Mutant
monster1.description: Moves quickly with unpredictable patterns. Hard to anticipate.

monster2.name: Hellhound
monster2.description: Tracks its prey from afar. Speed increases when close to the target.

monster3.name: Slaughter Samurai
monster3.description: Moves with deadly precision. Strikes suddenly.

darknight.name: Dark King
darknight.description: Controls darkness itself. Speed and movement patterns vary.

errorMessages.joinFailed: Failed to join game! Try again later.

selectQuizDescription: Choose a quiz to start your adventure!
characterSelectDescription: Select your chaser and configure your game settings!
